scenario_text.value: There they are! Kaito, Miu!
Oh, Takuma? What’re you so worked up over?

We’ve found a group of enemies. There’s too
many for me and Agumon to handle alone.
What?!

Now that’s what I’m talking about. I was
getting sick of turning over rocks, here.

Info on the shrine is more important than
a fight. Let’s try and talk to them first.

Not that I expect them to be in a talking
mood...

Fine by me. Smashing a few faces in’ll lift
my spirits.
Someone’s got violence on the brain again...
(At any rate, we gotta get going!)
Lend us a hand, Kaito!
Let’s go, Miu!
Lend us a hand, Kaito!
Lend us a hand, Kaito!

Oh I’ll lend you both, man. Curled up into
fists, ready to swing!

I’ll go too, Takuma! Kaito’s gonna see red if
someone doesn’t reel him in.
Thanks, that’s a great help!
Let’s go, Miu!
Let’s go, Miu!

Leave it to me! I’ll give those baddies
a piece of my mind!
If she’s going, then I’m going.
Yeah, sounds good. You come too, Kaito!
Word, time to head out!
Wait! Shouldn’t we go with the others?
Oh, good call. I’ll go let ’em know.
I’ll go with you! Takuma, you go on ahead!
Sure, go for it!
Can’t Miu just keep looking around here?

You’ll go berserk if I’m not around, right?
I’m definitely coming with you!
